Review_Text:
As a Mother of 7 i laughed and cried
Iwatch in 4dx xd so their visuals were no joke the have amazing visuals
Unpopular opinion:Monbebe is an angel
I rate this movie a 7/10
The mv performances were enjoyable and my personal favourite was im, im my freinds favourites as well.

Perfect! Perfect! Perfect! I am gonna watch it twice. I laughed, cried and spending very good time. I recommend all kpop fans to watch this film. You never regret. I love you Monsta x I am proud of you. I always be your side. Note: You can bring your napkin for your tears.

Be ready to laugh and cry!!Our boys don't disappoint!You can see they really love their Monbebe and think of us and what we want and try to incorporate that into what they do.They work so hard and they deserve more then what we can give back!

SpoilerIt's such a great movie.Everyone is so hardworking and dedicated.So talented, so amazing.Everyone should watch it 💜💜
It's so funny so interesting so amazing 👏
Monsta x work so hard for us they deserve everything. I recommend everyone to watch this movie you won't regret.
